subject: RE: [junit] Member variables become null between tests?
msgSnippet: Hi, Thank you very much for your inputs! For now I ve circumvented my problem by making the specific member variable static...But I hope to redesign my tests
messageBody:
Hi,

Thank you very much for your inputs!

For now I've circumvented my problem by making
the specific member variable static...But I hope to
redesign my tests to be independent of each other.

Regards
Ramanand
